Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $189.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:45:00 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Mimoglad Best Office Chair

Not To Brag, But After Extensive Research

Mimoglad—One of the largest professional manufacturers and exporters of Office Chair. Founded in 1995, has 5 major brands, 28 patents, passed various international tests and certifications including UL, GS, ETL, CQC….

We continually innovate our products which are exported to more than 60 countries. Our goal is to offer the most comfortable & most cost-effective chair and the best service in the world.

What makes our products unique?

Mimoglad has done a lot of investigations before we launched the ergonomic chairs. A bad office chair can cause back strain, leg problems, and carpal tunnel deformities, all of which will waste work time and reduce work efficiency. In a difficult situation, the loss of work efficiency means your unemployment rate is also rising. This is scary, isn’t it?

What do we provide?

We offer 5 years free fix to assure all customers that any needed repairs and replacements will be covered. Including but not limited to missing parts, damaged package, or Failed function.

[The Best Deal You Will Find] Every purchase is an important investment for you, including the feeling of the body, the life of the product, and the money out of pocket. Mimoglad provides 1* VALUE-FOR-MONEY ERGONOMIC CHAIR, 1*90 DAYS FREE RETURN AND REPLACEMENT, 1*5 YEARS ASSISTANT SERVICE. All problems that are faced can be solved.
[Encourage “S-Shaped” Spinal Posture] An ergonomic chair with proper support always maintain a healthy spine posture and will not have a damaging and flattening effect on your back. Good lumbar support will minimize strain or pain on the lumbar discs in your spine. The adjustable headrest prevents you from hunching forward, scrunching your shoulders. Don’t be slouching, this is the culprit.
[No Degradation of The Comfort Of The Butt] Choose sufficient padding and breathable material. Low-Quality foam can break down quickly (Not because you are a big man). So Mimoglad increased the quality & density of the foam to balance softness, durability, and support, thereby reducing pressure on your hips and tailbone. mesh fabric has a noticeable ability to wick moisture and it is highly breathable, You will not get bogged down with sweat.
[Get The Best Possible Fit and Feel] If you will be spending a lot of time in it, an adjustable computer chair is your best bet. Mimoglad chair allows lifting the headrest to land perfectly where your head is. Look for a pneumatic adjustment lever to let you bring the seat higher up or lower. the adjustable lumbar support to provide lumbar protection and eliminating lower back body strains. Reclining&rocking can help relieve pressure on your spinal discs.
[Sustainable Above First Impressions] The chair passed a commercial test so you can not worry about work and about the reliability of all elements. The frame of the high back office chair is made of strong nylon, which is most suitable for chair production. With the entire base made from high-strength metal, the strength and durability of this chair support will easily hold up to 400 lbs and for many years of extended use.

Ergonomic Backrest

Back support — maintaining a neutral posture lets your joints align naturally to reduce strain and stress on your muscles, tendons, and overall skeletal system.

Adjustable Lumbar support

Lumbar support — Good lower back or lumbar support is essential to minimize strain or compression on the lumbar discs in your spine.

360° Swivel Chair

With a modern compact looking and useful features, the ergonomic office chair goes well in office, gaming, and home.

Read more

Tension Controller

Rock for a rest — The tension device is a knob which can be adjusted to increase or decrease the force needed to rock.

Chair for 300 lbs Heavy People

4″ Seat Height liftable — Adjust the height of your office to your own height to reduce leg pressure.

Load up to 300lbs — SGS BIFMA Passed, stable for heavy people

Smoothly & quietly Wheels

Solid five-star base — made of polished aluminum alloy material, strong, non-rust than plastic.

Good for all type floor — Designed for your floor, carpet, hard surface or a combination.

Read more

4.5
Price: $189.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:45:00 UTC – Details)

Price: $299.99 - $219.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:08:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Series E I Office Desk Chair

Series J I Office Desk Chair

Ergonomic Desgin: Big & tall executive office chair has Double layer soft cushion can keep you away from the numbness caused by long sitting.Thickened headrest and backrest fit to the curve of human spine can give you strong support and help you release back pressure.
High-Quality Material: This executive office chair upholstered in high-quality PU leather. It’s a soft, lustrous, durable and water-proof. Comfortable cushion consis of native sponge and PP cotton, soft and resilient.
Flexible Using Style: You can flip the arms up and do things that can’t be done in other chairs, such as playing guitar or sitting cross-legged. You can also put the chair under the desk for saving space by fliping up the arms.
Adjustable Function: The pneumatic seat height adjustment can meets your different needs.Rocking backwards from 90 to 125 degree can relax you in spare time.degree. 360 degree rotation cushion and rolling swivel caster make this desk chair more flexible and convenient.
Assembly and Security: Certified by BIFMA and weight support up to 330 pounds. Besides, It’s easy to assembly, and you will not need to prepare additional tools for the assembly.
Customer Warranty Service: Hbada provides three years warranty that is processed in the most hassle-free way possible. Customer-first is the original aspiration of Hbada.No matter what problems you encounter during use, you can contact us. We will provide you with professional services on the product.

Flip-Up Armrest

Padded flip-up armrests provide a soft support and allow you to make the most of your space.

Rocking Function

Chair can be rocked front and back about 25 degree, you can have a leisurely break while sit on the chair.

Comfortable Cushion

The double-layer cushion consists of polypropylene cotton and native sponge, relieve the pain from long time sitting.

Read more

PU-leather ergonomic office chair

About this chair

An Executive chair with a high-back features a PU leather exterior to provide a timeless style that fits in nearly any room. Pneumatic, seat-height adjustment allows a variety of users to sit comfortably at their desks. 360-degree swivel allows you to effortlessly rotate the chair for added convenience.

Product description

  • Adjustable height
  • Flip-up arms
  • 360 degree swivel
  • Double layer support
  • High-end soft Pu leather

For different occassions:

  • Bedrooms
  • Office
  • Study room
  • Meeting room
  • Conference room

Read more

4

item.title: ARM & HAMMER Swivel Bin & Rake Pooper Scooper
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) DOG POOPER SCOOPER WITH ADJUSTABLE HANDLE: The lightweight handle extends up to 32 inches, which prevents the need to bend, kneel or squat to pick up pet waste. No more breaking your back to bend down and scoop up dog poop with your hand and dog poop bag. Rake and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:49:29 UTC – Details)



DOG POOPER SCOOPER WITH ADJUSTABLE HANDLE: The lightweight handle extends up to 32 inches, which prevents the need to bend, kneel or squat to pick up pet waste. No more breaking your back to bend down and scoop up dog poop with your hand and dog poop bag. Rake and then lift the pan to contain waste.
NEXT LEVEL QUALITY: Arm and Hammer waste bags help keep your bin clean and provide natural odor control with activated baking soda.2x thicker than standard grocery bags and helps contain large quantities of pet waste. Less messy than a broom and dustpan set, perfect for your dog housebreaking supplies.
HEAVY DUTY BAGS: These poop bags are two times thicker than standard grocery bags. Fresh Scent along with activated baking soda help to neutralize foul odors while you work. The handle ties prevent touching the waste and keeps stink in while you are taking the dog poop bag out.
ARM & HAMMER, ODOR CONTROL YOU CAN TRUST: From waste bag dispensers and litter box wipes to litter pans, liners, scoops, and pet beds, Arm & Hammer has you and your pet covered with mess-fighting solutions that people know and trust. Refill bags are available for purchase separately.
HOW TO USE BAGS: Pull a single bag from the perforated section on the side of the package. Loop bag handles around molded hooks on side of the bin. When finished scooping, unhook bag handles, tie with easy-tie handles and dispose of properly. Questions or complaints, contact us as we are happy to help.

Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:49:29 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Purifying the air and good for health

XXXFLOWER is committed to the design and production of DIY decorations for garden, home, office, kitchen and bathroom. The design style is retro and charming, adding a simple and classic feel to your living space.

Perfect Combination

Natural wood has a unique textures, light but firm, high transparent borosilicate glass is smooth without scratches,allowing you to observe the growth of plants more clearly. Great for growing houseplants and can purify indoor air and good for health

More Stable Design

The metal swivel holder passes through the glass bulb, which is convenient to change the water and not easy to knock over.Propagates your plant’s babies in style, slim glass container provides plenty of room for plant’s roots and all are visible for observing its growth condition.

Best Patio Decoration

Hydroponic plant propagator can beautify and purify your room and office, it will create fresh green atmosphere and make you feel relaxed.The cute plant terrarium propagator with high-quality is great for flower arrangement, window sill, office decoration.

Super Stability and Smooth

High-quality mosaic structure, beautiful, smooth and not rough, thickened glass, no easy to break

Planter Tips

Retro wooden plant propagation station glass for Desktop , perfect for growing plants houseplants, for example water plants or fern.

You can use your imagination to your heart’s content with the plants you like.

For example:

Green dillGeraniumMintVine plantBaby’s breathRoseTulip

Best Gift for Plant lover
